name: Improving Analysis Workflow with [I]Python
body:
### Our Goal
To show you analysis workflow using [[I]Python](http://ipython.org) 
notebook environment. We will be presenting 
### Location and Time
TBD. Tentatively, there will be 2 sessions.

* **Setup Session**. One hour long session on Monday for helping people install necessary tools. You can
follow the installation instruction in advance. If there is any problem with
installation, come to this session for help
* **Tutorial Session** Three hour long tutorial seesion the day right after the collaboration meeting. Remember to book your plane ticket for an extra day.
